div.div:
298 Norwich-Westerly Road
North Stonington, CT 06359
P: 860-535-2800
F: 860-535-1470
© 2014-2017 North Stonington Public Schools

The purpose of the North Stonington Public Schools Web Site is to provide educational information for our school,
staff, students, their parents, and the community. Through the North Stonington Public Schools Web Site, however,
there are links to the worldwide resources of the Internet. The North Stonington Public Schools Web Site is responsible
for links on its own homepages but has no control over links to other resources on the WWW. Every effort is made
to provide information that is appropriate for our school and community.
